page.title: 06BUCKLAND NEWTON PIG FARM
page.content: ************************************** *On Buckland Newton pig farm there are 660 sows. They used to be mainly Saddle Back pigs but now they are Dutch hybrids. Each sow produces 25 piglets a year. Previously sows produced only 18. The shape of the pigs has changed drastically because people prefer less fat these days. Fat used to be 5cm. whereas today only 1cm. is required. Twenty years ago 4lb. of pig food produced 1lb. of meat. Today 2.18 lb. of food produces 1lb. of meat. The vet visits 4 times a year to advise. Antibiotics are used by the workers.Pigs are sold for bacon. 15,000 pigs are sold per year. They are sold by contract selling. A whole lot together. ************************************** **************************************
